title: template
author: template
content: HiI need high quality utility bill or bank statement you can prepare? I can pay by crypto

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: 1. You haven't specified the utility bill for which location. 2. Which bank and from where?Obviously, Utility bills and banks are used as proof of address when one is getting verified. Can't use a Utility bill from Argentina to verify an account from the UKOn that note, what is the problem with using your actual details?
